com.joliciel.talismane.parser.evaluate

Interface ParseEvaluationObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ParseConfigurationProcessorWrapper, ParseEvaluationSentenceWriter, ParserFScoreCalculator, ParserFScoreCalculatorByDistance, ParseTimeByLengthObserver, TransitionLogWriter

    public interface ParseEvaluationObserver
    An interface that observes a parsing evaluation while its occurring.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<ParseEvaluationObserver> getObservers(java.io.File outDir, TalismaneSession session)
      Collect the observers specified in the configuration key talismane.core.[sessionId].parser.evaluate.observers.

      Each processor must implement this interface and must have a constructor matching one of the following signatures:
      - ( File outputDir, TalismaneSession session)
      - ( TalismaneSession session)
      void onEvaluationComplete()
      Called when full evaluation has completed.
      void onParseEnd(ParseConfiguration realConfiguration, java.util.List<ParseConfiguration> guessedConfigurations)
      Called when the next parse configuration has been processed.
      void onParseStart(ParseConfiguration realConfiguration, java.util.List<PosTagSequence> posTagSequences)
      Called before parsing begins

      • getObservers

        static java.util.List<ParseEvaluationObserver> getObservers(java.io.File outDir,
                                                            TalismaneSession session)
                                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                                            java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                            java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException,
                                                            TalismaneException
        Collect the observers specified in the configuration key talismane.core.[sessionId].parser.evaluate.observers.

        Each processor must implement this interface and must have a constructor matching one of the following signatures:
        - ( File outputDir, TalismaneSession session)
        - ( TalismaneSession session)

        Parameters:
        outDir - directory in which to write the various outputs
        session - to read the configuration
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        TalismaneException - if an observer does not implement this interface, or if no constructor is found with the correct signature
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException
